item.title: [Raspberry Pi]使用Python查詢溫度
item.author: malagege
item.description: 1 2 3 4 f = open("/sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/temp","r") for t in f: print "CPU temp:"+t[:2]+"."+t[2:5] f.close()
